product.name: 1L Lactantia Milk
product.description: Our story starts over 70 years ago with a visionary dairy producer from Victoriaville, Quebec. His name was Lionel Beaudet. His passion was all things nature. And his mission was simple: preserve the wholesome goodness that brings out the best in fresh dairy. And not much has changed since. To this day, we’ve continued Beaudet’s farm-fresh tradition with quality products that respect the purity of nature. Whether it’s our PūrFiltre milks or the butter that started it all, the result is always great tasting dairy you can feel good about. No more, no less. Ingredients : Partly skimmed milk, vitamin a palmitate, vitamin d3.

product.name: 2L Quebon Milk
product.description: Why change tradition ? Québon partly skimmed 2% milk combines the great taste and freshness of Quebec's milk with many vitamins and minerals necessary for the maintenance of good health. From our farms to your family. Ingredients : Partly skimmed milk, vitamin a palmitate, vitamin d3.

product.name: Astro Balkan Yogurt
product.description: Astro Original Plain yogourt contains only natural ingredients and is deliciously thick and creamy. Perfect for eating, cooking and baking – be sure to try it in all your favourite recipes. The way yogourt is meant to be! Ingredients: Grade A reduced-fat milk, sugar, water, fructose or fruit sugar, modified food starch, less than 1 percent milk protein concentrate, modified corn starch, kosher gelatin, agar, guar gum, lactic acid, calcium lactate, vitamin D3 and sodium citrate.

product.name: Ribeye Steak
product.description: Beef from a local free-range farm. Portioned into steaks with a thickness of 2 in. Ingredients: Beef.

product.name: Chicken Leg
product.description: Chicken Breasts sourced from a local free-range chicken farm. Ingredients

product.name: Marinated Chicken Tikka
product.description: Chunks of chicken marinated in spices and yogurt for preparation on the barbeque or in the oven. Usually served in a creamy curry sauce. Ingredients : chicken, spices (curry powder, chili powder, garam masala), yogurt

product.name: Fried Calamari
product.description: The Calamari sold at Mirchi are the best east coast squid you'll find, fresh off the boat and hand made flower from the best spices you can find in Asia. The fried Calamari rivals even the most exquisite restaurants dishes. One unit of this product consists approx. 26 per package

product.name: Sushi
product.description: The Sushi sold at Mirchi are freshly made and packaged everyday for people to enjoy during lunch, the package contains 12 pieces of sushi 4x all mixed, 4x shrimp, 4x salmon. One unit of this product consists of 12 pieces per package.

product.name: Fried Shrimp
product.description: The Fried Shrimp sold at Mirchi are the best hand breaded shrimp you'll find in Canada, the hand made flower comes from the best spices within our own store. The fried shrimp rivals even Popeyes famous shrimp.

product.name: Butter Chicken Masala
product.description: Ingredients : Coriander seeds, Red Chillies, Iodised Salt, Black Pepper, Turmeric, Garlic, Cassia, Dried Ginger, Fennel Seeds, Cardamom Amomum, Cloves, Nutmeg, Mace.

product.name: Turmeric Powder
product.description: A spice used in India for centuries, this spice gives Indian food that rich taste and colour. It is excellent for your health and has benefits such as being anti-inflammatory.

product.name: Red Chilli Powder
product.description: A spice used in India for centuries, this spice gives Indian food that rich taste and colour. It is excellent for your health and adds a rich unique spicyness. Ingredients : Red Chillies.

product.name: Ajinomoto MSG
product.description: A popular seasoning and flavor enhancer, MSG, or monosodium glutamate, is the purest form of umami, the fifth taste. MSG (monosodium glutamate) is widely used to intensify and enhance umami flavors in sauces, broths, soups and many more foods. It can also be used as a partial replacement for salt, containing just one-third the sodium, and is classed as safe by the United States Food and Drug Administration and the World Health Organization. Originally associated mainly with Asian cuisines, MSG (monosodium glutamate) is now used around the world to bring out the delicious flavor of foods.

product.name: Bagels
product.description: The Mirchi bagel is a distinctive handmade and wood-fired baked bagel. It’s soft, chewy and incredibly delicious. It contains malt, egg, and no salt, and is boiled in honey-sweetened water before being baked.

product.name: Croissants
product.description: A viennoiserie classic, a Mirchi croissant is light, flaky and buttery. It is a crescent-shaped baked good made from yeast-leavened dough and butter.

product.name: Honey Pistachio Baklava
product.description: A popular Middle Eastern dessert made with thin crisp layers of buttered filo sheets and filled with a sweet pistachio mixture. It is baked crisp, then soaked in sugar syrup that just melts in the mouth.
